scenes.background: You decided to see how far you and [Monica] can get before involving [Bob].
scenes.description: 'Hey, I noticed you two are handling the task. Need any help? I'm available.' He stands up, looking ready.

options.text: Thanks, Bob. We might need your help soon, but let's try a bit more on our own first.
options.analysis: You show a balanced approach by acknowledging Bob's offer while focusing on the task, but could improve emotional perception.

options.text: Actually, Bob, your help would be great right now. Let's tackle this together.
options.analysis: You show high empathy and social skills by involving Bob immediately, but it may affect your self-regulation and motivation.

options.text: No, Bob. We have it under control for now. Let's not disrupt our flow.
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation by keeping the current setup, but empathy and emotional perception could be improved.
